mdRecord.dcterms:title: 8038--Washington's Old Home, Mt. Vernon, Va., U. S. A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of east front of the Mansion at Mount Vernon. Photograph taken from the southeast lawn. Mounted on gray board. The publisher's imprint on the front of the card reads: Keystone View Company, Manufacturers, Made in U.S.A., Publishers, Meadville, Pa., New York, N.Y., Portland, Oregon, London, Eng., Sydney, Aus. Title: 8038--Washington's Old Home, Mt. Vernon, Va., U. S. A. The reverse includes a printed history of site including geographic coordinates. Number 96 in a series. Copyright by The Keystone View Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
